name: Srinivas Dharavath

current_company.name: Atlas Systems
current_company.title: AI Engineer | GenAI | LLM Fine-tuning | RAG | MLOps | Huggingface | Software Developer | AWS Solution Architect | IIT Madras

experience.title: AI Engineer
experience.description: **LLM Fine-Tuning:** Generated a 9.75M token dataset from 15 Indian law textbooks and performed LoRA continual pretraining on LLaMA3 8B using A100 GPUs for over 20 hours.**Document Processing Chatbot:** Built a chatbot leveraging Claude 3.5 to analyze and process user-uploaded documents or folders, delivering high-accuracy insights with contextual understanding.**Scalable Storage:** Integrated Amazon S3 for secure and scalable storage of user-uploaded documents, enabling efficient real-time data processing.**Interactive Frontend:** Developed a user-friendly frontend using Streamlit, facilitating seamless document uploads and intuitive interactions with the chatbot.**Metadata Extraction:** Designed a tool to extract metadata from uploaded files of various formats using GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Sonnet, deployed via FastAPI.**LLM Deployment:** Deployed Qwen 2.5 7B model on an EC2 instance and as a SageMaker endpoint for inference, optimizing performance and reliability.**High-Performance Infrastructure:** Utilized an ml.g5.24xlarge instance in SageMaker for faster inference responses, implementing auto-scaling to handle concurrent requests effectively.**Backend Optimization:** Ensured robust and efficient deployment pipelines for AI solutions, enhancing scalability and responsiveness for diverse user needs.
experience.description_html: **LLM Fine-Tuning:** Generated a 9.75M token dataset from 15 Indian law textbooks and performed LoRA continual pretraining on LLaMA3 8B using A100 GPUs for over 20 hours.**Document Processing Chatbot:** Built a chatbot leveraging Claude 3.5 to analyze and process user-uploaded documents or folders, delivering high-accuracy insights with contextual understanding.**Scalable Storage:** Integrated Amazon S3 for secure and scalable storage of user-uploaded documents, enabling efficient real-time data processing.**Interactive Frontend:** Developed a user-friendly frontend using Streamlit, facilitating seamless document uploads and intuitive interactions with the chatbot.**Metadata Extraction:** Designed a tool to extract metadata from uploaded files of various formats using GPT-4o and Claude 3.5 Sonnet, deployed via FastAPI.**LLM Deployment:** Deployed Qwen 2.5 7B model on an EC2 instance and as a SageMaker endpoint for inference, optimizing performance and reliability.**High-Performance Infrastructure:** Utilized an ml.g5.24xlarge instance in SageMaker for faster inference responses, implementing auto-scaling to handle concurrent requests effectively.**Backend Optimization:** Ensured robust and efficient deployment pipelines for AI solutions, enhancing scalability and responsiveness for diverse user needs.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Working as a Backend Python Developer and AWS Solution Architect. Specializing in serverless architecture, customer engagement systems, and optimization strategies. Proven track record in AWS services, Django, and Terraform.
